title: How to Make Chokladkakor (Chocolate Bars)

steps.headline: Mix all ingredients except 1 egg and granulated sugar to a smooth dough.
Divide the dough into 6 pieces and shape them into balls.
Place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Flatten the rolls slightly and brush them with over with beaten egg; sprinkle with sugar.
Cut them into 2–3 centimeter (0.8–1.2 in) wide, crooked pieces, while still warm.
Sprinkle cinnamon or coconut onto the pieces if desired.

text: Preheat oven to 345°F/175°C.  Mix all ingredients except 1 egg and granulated sugar to a smooth dough.  Divide the dough into 6 pieces and shape them into balls.  Place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.  Flatten the rolls slightly and brush them with over with beaten egg; sprinkle with sugar.  Bake in oven for 11-15 minutes.  Cut them into 2–3 centimeter (0.8–1.2 in) wide, crooked pieces, while still warm.  Sprinkle cinnamon or coconut onto the pieces if desired.  Cool slightly before serving.
